Offset and Multiplier Property

Short Name: Ofst&Mult

Requires: Base Development System

Class: GraphScale Properties

To Use: Create a property.

Cluster of offset(Xo) and multiplier(deltaX) for scaling values such that the final value equals (deltaX)*X + Xo.

This property applies only to the active X-scale or active Y-scale.

This property is similar to the Offset and Multiplier options on the Scales page of the Properties dialog box.

Elements

Offset and Multiplier:Offset

Offset and Multiplier:Multiplier

Remarks

The following table lists the characteristics of this property.

Data type
PermissionsRead/Write
Available in Run-Time EngineYes
Available in Real-Time Operating SystemYes
Settable when the VI is runningYes
Loads the front panel into memoryNo
Need to authenticate before useNo
Loads the block diagram into memoryNo
Remote access allowedYes
